issue.title: [R] Implement Duration R6 class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14941](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14941). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14941?focusedCommentId=17458645) by Jonathan Keane (jonkeane):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11850
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11850>

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14941?focusedCommentId=17459160) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
`[~jonkeane]` Please make sure the issue is properly assigned after merging :-)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14941?focusedCommentId=17496786) by Dragoș Moldovan-Grünfeld (dragosmg):*
Correct me if I am wrong, but I don't think this PR implements a binding for `{}lubridate::duration(){`}.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14941?focusedCommentId=17496808) by Dragoș Moldovan-Grünfeld (dragosmg):*
Cool. Thanks. I somehow missed that. I've now closed the duplicate issue.
